definition.text: There are tons of things we haven't covered yet, I know! Just look around! So much stuff to see! It's mind-boggling.

paragraphs.text: I'm sure you still have tons of questions floating in your head... How do I build my own strategies? How do I measure performance? How do I build an indicator? How do I deploy a trading farm? How may I integrate with TradingView? How do I set up Telegram announcements? Don't worry! You'll get there my friend... you'll just have to do some reading!
In the meantime, remember to stop your live session and data mining when you no longer need them running, and especially before closing the Client.
